name: Wonder Guard
description: This Pokemon's body is protected by an incredible otherworldly aura. Most things get through as if nothing was there.
effect: This pokemon only takes minimum damage from attacking moves aswell as damage from afflicted Status Conditions. Unlike others, this pokemon's HP is not doubled, only being the total of Base HP and Vitality added together. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied or replaced (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Trace etc.)
